name: Liliput Legend
description:
A love letter to the classic Final Fantasies, the Tales of Phantasia and Rudra alike, the Breaths of Fire and the Secrets of Mana. Embark on a quest of friendship and heroism, of Magic and Bladework, and the right to be free. 

My goal with Liliput Legend is to capture the essence of what made those SNES RPGs that helped define me as a gamer. The stories, the characters, the battles and the gimmicks are all sculpted in a way that should, I hope, fit in a SNES-era title. If after playing you feel a need to replay one of those amazing titles, then I will have done my job well. Happy gaming <3

---

Araina and Ilyana are mercenaries by trade, sharing stories of coin and battle over a table of warm ale when they became drawn in a fight that quickly consumes their every waking hour. Now, following the trial of a Witch with powers unexplainable to even the most studious mind, they must gather allies and learn the truth of that strange magic and the world itself.

---

Features: 

- Sideview Battle system mimicking the strongest points of old school games, with a dynamic in-battle party swap system to ensure you always have the right answer to any monster.

- Real, fleshed out characters that grow as the story progresses.

- A Favor system to grow your relationships with party members, unlocking additional content with each such as Quests and special Events.

- Sidequests Ranging from the silly to the serious, all contained within a handy in-menu journal to keep track of each one.

- Over a dozen Minigames, from casino, to action, to just for fun!

- Hand drawn one-of-a-kind pixel art by the wizard himself; @UranArts!

- A beautifully crafted art style from the uber-talented @Megatiles2D and @finalbossblues.

- Fantastic sweeping musical themes from the stellar WinglessSeraph.

- And much more to come <3
